Model.Factory

Interface IFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgentFactory

    public interface IFactory
    Interface used to manipulate Creators

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Agent create(AgentType type, java.lang.String color, int bonus)
      Creates an Agent with default stats values
      Agent createAgent(AgentType type, int hp, int damageReduction, int speed, int strength, java.lang.String color)
      Creates an Agent with stats

    • Method Detail

      • createAgent

        Agent createAgent(AgentType type,
                  int hp,
                  int damageReduction,
                  int speed,
                  int strength,
                  java.lang.String color)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates an Agent with stats
        Parameters:
        type - type of the agent
        hp - health points
        damageReduction - armor
        speed - speed
        strength - resistance
        color - blue or red
        Returns:
        the created Agent
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any creation problem occurs

      • create

        Agent create(AgentType type,
             java.lang.String color,
             int bonus)
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates an Agent with default stats values
        Parameters:
        type - type of the agent
        color - blue or red
        bonus - bonus given by the user
        Returns:
        the created Agent
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any creation problem occurs
